directions: Stir cottage cheese and whipped topping together in a bowl; sprinkle gelatin over the top and mix thoroughly. Stir pineapple, oranges, and marshmallows into cottage cheese mixture. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
2 (3 ounce) packages orange-flavored gelatin (such as Jell-O®)
title: Thanksgiving Orange Salad
